
{info}
JCRs are listed below for the informational purpose only. For example, if the customer application needs to use the same third-parties used by eXo CMIS but with another version.
All files are delivered in eXo Platform 3.5 distribution.
{info}

eXo CMIS consists of JAR files below:

{docbook}
<para>
<citetitle>
xCMIS project files (for xCMIS 1.2.x)
</citetitle>
</para>
{docbook}

* xcmis-renditions-X.X.X.jar
* xcmis-restatom-X.X.X.jar
* xcmis-search-model-X.X.X.jar
* xcmis-search-parser-cmis-X.X.X.jar
* xcmis-search-service-X.X.X.jar
* xcmis-spi-X.X.X.jar

{docbook}
<para>
<citetitle>
eXo WCM Storage Provider for xCMIS SPI (uses the same version as the WCM/ECMS system)
</citetitle>
</para>
{docbook}


* exo-ecms-ext-xcmis-sp-Y.Y.Y.jar 

{docbook}
<para>
<citetitle>
Third-party dependencies (for xCMIS 1.2.x)
</citetitle>
</para>
{docbook}

* _abdera-client-0.4.0-incubating.jar_
* _abdera-core-0.4.0-incubating.jar_
* _abdera-i18n-0.4.0-incubating.jar_
* _abdera-parser-0.4.0-incubating.jar_
* _abdera-server-0.4.0-incubating.jar_
* _antlr-runtime-3.1.3.jar_
* _axiom-api-1.2.5.jar_
* _axiom-impl-1.2.5.jar_
* _jaxen-1.1.1.jar_
* _lucene-regex-2.4.1.jar_


{docbook}
